subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Georgetown had a near-perfect second-half shooting performance Monday, as its sophomore-laden team put on an offensive clinic against No. 11 U.C.L.A. in the second semifinal of the Legends Classic.
snippet: Georgetown had a near-perfect second-half shooting performance Monday, as its sophomore-laden team put on an offensive clinic against No. 11 U.C.L.A. in the second semifinal of the Legends Classic.
